EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Downloading Virtual Health Monitor. Now Let's Party.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HOW TO ACTIVATE VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor <http://bit.ly/1gpucA3>
Invoice to Follow. Just Kidding. It's Free. Forever.
Heyo! Look at you go. You just downloaded VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor, our free and unlimited monitoring tool built on the same platform as our award winning control system for cloud and virtualized data centers, VMTurbo Operations Manager. Request your license key here <http://bit.ly/1gpucA3>.
Once you've deployed VHM, the initial credentials are administrator for username and password. The setup wizard will handle the rest. Enjoy.
Your IT Control System, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
